mapper.select: SELECT ACC_RESERVATION_NAME,ACC_RESERVATION_TYPE,ACC_RESERVATION_DATE,ACC_RESERVATION_TIME,ACC_RESERVATION_START_ADDRESS,ACC_RESERVATION_END_ADDRESS FROM TBL_ACC_RESERVATION a,TBL_MANAGER b WHERE a.ACC_RESERVATION_START_ADDRESS = b.MANAGER_ADDRESS

SELECT CARE_RESERVATION_NAME,CARE_RESERVATION_TYPE,CARE_RESERVATION_DATE,CARE_RESERVATION_TIME,CARE_RESERVATION_ADDRESS FROM TBL_CARE_RESERVATION a,TBL_MANAGER b WHERE a.CARE_RESERVATION_ADDRESS = b.MANAGER_ADDRESS
